update t_waybill set
waybill_status = #{waybillStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
longitude=#{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
latitude=#{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
unload_location=#{unloadLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unload_time=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
electronical_receipt = #{electronicalReceipt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_id = #{updateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_name = #{updateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id in ( #{waybillIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) and company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_waybill set
waybill_status = #{waybillStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
longitude=#{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
latitude=#{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
unload_location=#{unloadLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unload_time=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
electronical_receipt = #{electronicalReceipt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_id = #{updateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_name = #{updateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id in ( #{waybillIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) and carrier_company_id = #{carrierCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_waybill set waybill_status = #{waybillStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, update_id = #{updateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_name = #{updateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where waybill_plan_id = ( #{waybillPlanId,jdbcType=BIGINT} ) and company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select from t_waybill where(company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} or carrier_company_id = #{carrierCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}) and (waybill_plan_id = #{waybillPlanId,jdbcType=BIGINT} or id in ( #{waybillIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )) and is_deleted = 0 order by id desc

select distinct waybill_plan_id from t_waybill where (company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} or carrier_company_id = #{carrierCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}) and (waybill_plan_id = #{waybillPlanId,jdbcType=BIGINT} or id in ( #{waybillIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )) and is_deleted = 0

select from t_waybill where(company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} or carrier_company_id = #{carrierCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}) and waybill_plan_id = #{waybillPlanId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_deleted = 0
and waybill_status !=8
order by id desc

select from t_waybill where(company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} or carrier_company_id = #{carrierCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}) and split_goods_id = #{splitGoodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_deleted = 0 and waybill_status !=8 order by id desc

select from t_waybill where(company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} or carrier_company_id = #{carrierCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}) and waybill_plan_id = #{waybillPlanId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and split_goods_id = #{splitGoodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_deleted = 0 and waybill_status !=8 order by id desc
select from t_waybill where id in ( #{waybillIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) and is_deleted = 0 order by id desc
mapper.update: update t_waybill set driver_id = #{driverId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, driver_name = #{driverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, driver_phone = #{driverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vechicle_id = #{vechicleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, vechicle_num = #{vechicleNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select from t_waybill driver_id = #{driverId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
order by id desc
